entry.title: Bitstamp Follows Other Exchanges in Canceling Orders for FTX and Celsius Tokens
entry.summary: The Luxembourg-based exchange lags many in the industry in shuttering access to the embattled tokens, which still remain actively traded by some.

entry.title: Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust Hits Record-Low 43% Discount After FTX Crisis
entry.summary: GBTC is trading at a major discount to Bitcoin, removing the appeal of the prominent investment vehicle.

entry.title: Genesis Sought $1B Bailout From Investors Before Halting Withdrawals: Report
entry.summary: The crypto lender Genesis paused withdrawals from its lending arm on Wednesday, citing “abnormal withdrawal requests.”

entry.title: Here Are the Sports Marketing Deals Crumbling Along With FTX
entry.summary: Nearly all of FTX’s sports and esports partners have bolted for the doors as the exchange implodes.

entry.title: FTX Bankruptcy Jurisdiction Fight: Bahamas Regulators Now Confirm They Directed SBF to Move Assets
entry.summary: An FTX filing says the embattled ex-CEO moved assets after declaring bankruptcy, giving the island nation an edge.

entry.title: Solana NFT Protocol Metaplex Announces Layoffs in Wake of FTX Collapse
entry.summary: While it had no financial exposure to the fallen exchange, Metaplex appears to be suffering from reputational damage spreading to Solana.

entry.title: FTX Catastrophe Likely Triggered By Terra Collapse: Nansen
entry.summary: $4 billion in FTT tracked from Alameda to FTX aligns with reports of a loan—using customers funds—from the exchange to the trading desk.

entry.title: CZ Says Sam Bankman-Fried Was ‘Badmouthing’ Binance in DC—But They Weren’t in a ‘Battle’
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao says FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried was never a rival.

entry.title: Proof of Reserves Isn't a 'Panacea' for Future FTX-Like Collapses, Industry Leaders Caution
entry.summary: Following the epic meltdown of one of the biggest players in crypto, some within the industry are calling for “proof of reserves” to provide greater transparency—but it has its limitations.

entry.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

entry.title: UK Lawmakers Don’t Buy Binance’s Evidence on FTX Collapse
entry.summary: The UK’s Parliamentary Treasury Committee asked Binance for internal correspondence. It received a load of news articles instead.

entry.title: Crypto Is Flowing Out of Exchanges: 'Severe' Outflows From Gemini, OKX and Crypto.com, Says JP Morgan
entry.summary: Analysts at the investment bank have also noted that the stablecoin market is taking a beating.

entry.title: Senator Warren Demands Details on FTX’s Books, 'Officials Responsible'
entry.summary: Warren, in a letter to FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, requested internal company documents to help explain the crypto exchange’s eyebrow-raising practices.

entry.title: FTX Isn't Sure How Much Money It Has or How Many People It Employs: CEO John J. Ray
entry.summary: FTX has "secured only a fraction of the digital assets," that it believes it owns, Ray said in an affidavit on Thursday.

entry.title: 3LAU’s Royal Debuts Marketplace to Bring Music NFTs to the Masses
entry.summary: Following music NFT drops with Diplo, Nas, and The Chainsmokers, Royal’s marketplace is finally live—and a mobile app is on the horizon, too.

entry.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
entry.summary: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

entry.title: 'God Mode': SBF’s Alameda Had 'Secret Exemptions' on FTX, New CEO Alleges
entry.summary: Alameda Research played outside of liquidation rules on FTX, John J. Ray III claims in a new bankruptcy filing.

entry.title: Binance Temporarily Suspends Deposits of USDC, USDT on Solana
entry.summary: Binance has yet to provide an explanation for the move, which has been mirrored by other major crypto exchanges.

entry.title: Chainalysis Confirmed as FTX Creditor in Bankruptcy Case
entry.summary: With court filings to reveal the top 50 creditors this week, Chainalysis has announced that it, too, is owed money due to the FTX collapse.

entry.title: 'Only a Psychopath Can Write That Tweet': Binance CEO CZ on SBF
entry.summary: Zhao also said he told Bankman-Fried to “put on a suit, go to D.C. and start answering questions.”

entry.title: Former Enron Liquidator Finds 'Complete Absence of Trustworthy Financial Information' at FTX
entry.summary: FTX’s new chief executive has blasted his predecessor in scathing documents filed as part of the exchange’s bankruptcy proceedings.

entry.title: What the Genesis Loan Suspension Teaches Us About Crypto Lending
entry.summary: Genesis Global Trading, one of the largest crypto lenders and institutions, announced on November 16 that they would "temporarily suspend redemptions and new loan originations in the lending business."

entry.title: Australia’s Biggest Stock Exchange Shelves Blockchain Project, Writes Off $170M
entry.summary: Seven years into development, the blockchain system failed to meet the requirements for Australia’s biggest stock exchange ASX.

entry.title: El Salvador to Start Buying 1 Bitcoin Every Day Says President Bukele
entry.summary: El Salvador will reportedly begin buying one Bitcoin every day, according to the country's president Nayib Bukele.

entry.title: Bankrupt Compute North Sells $1.55M in Assets to Flared-Gas Bitcoin Miner
entry.summary: Crusoe Energy is scooping up some of Compute North’s assets following the latter’s bankruptcy filing back in September.

entry.title: Avalanche Founder Says Company Has ‘Very Little Exposure’ to FTX
entry.summary: The Ava Labs founder said that the real damage from FTX was in propping up the price of tokens to borrow against them.

entry.title: Voyager 'Shocked, Disgruntled, Dismayed' by FTX Bankruptcy as Crypto Lender Searches for Another Buyer
entry.summary: “There will be no transaction with FTX, I think that is quite obvious,” Voyager's attorney said at a hearing on Tuesday.

entry.title: New FTX CEO Distances Company From SBF After Controversial DMs Surface
entry.summary: FTX’s new post-bankruptcy leader may not be a fan of Sam Bankman-Fried’s social media transparency.

entry.title: Coachella NFTs Sold for $1.5M—Now They’re Stuck on FTX
entry.summary: Following FTX’s collapse, assets on its NFT marketplace can’t be withdrawn—and some FTX-minted NFTs are broken too.

entry.title: Bahamas Regulators Want Control of FTX Bankruptcy Proceedings
entry.summary: The Bahamas Securities Commission wants to take control of FTX’s liquidation. But FTX wants the process to take place in the U.S.

entry.title: Janet Yellen: FTX Meltdown Shows Need for 'More Effective Oversight' of Crypto
entry.summary: The Treasury Secretary reiterated concerns that trouble in the crypto market could eventually "raise broader financial stability concerns."

entry.title: Crypto Liquidity Provider B2C2 Offers to Purchase Loans from Genesis
entry.summary: Founder Max Boonen says the gesture is intended to “support the wider market.”

entry.title: Justin Bieber Paid $1.3 Million for a Bored Ape NFT. It’s Now Worth $69K
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs are sinking in value this month, with the floor price now down 84% from the April peak.

entry.title: Gemini Restores Service to Exchange After Outage Spooks Investors
entry.summary: Gemini went down today for less than an hour after announcing its lending partner was pausing withdrawals.

entry.title: Gemini Dollar Lending Rates Spiked as High as 73% on Aave Amid Genesis Freeze
entry.summary: With Genesis, one of Gemini's lending providers, suspending withdrawals, rates on Aave went haywire as speculators fled GUSD or shorted it.

entry.title: FTX Lawsuit Takes Aim at Larry David, Tom Brady for Promoting Crypto Exchange
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried is facing a class action lawsuit from FTX investors alleging the firm’s yield-bearing crypto accounts broke Florida laws.

entry.title: House Committee Calls on SBF, Binance to Testify on FTX Collapse
entry.summary: Lawmakers want to hear from Sam Bankman-Fried and others involved following the “tremendous harm” the FTX collapse posed to investors.

entry.title: Esports Giant TSM Suspends $210M FTX Naming Rights Deal
entry.summary: FTX’s largest-disclosed sponsorship is on pause after the exchange declared bankruptcy on Friday.

entry.title: Matter Labs Raises $200M to Scale Ethereum With zkSync Solution
entry.summary: Alongside the Series C round, Matter Labs is also open-sourcing its code for its zero-knowledge technology zkSync.

entry.title: Gemini Earn Warns Customers of Likely Withdrawal Delays Due to Genesis Lending Pause
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Gemini announced that there may be withdrawal delays to its Earn product due to its lending partner halting withdrawals.

entry.title: Genesis Suspending Client Withdrawals for Lending Arm Citing 'FTX Impact'
entry.summary: After a volatile week amid the collapse of FTX, crypto prime broker Genesis announced that it would pause withdrawals from its lending arm.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific Facing Lawsuit for Improperly Disclosing Financials
entry.summary: Core Scientific is being sued for allegedly failing to disclose several high-profile disputes with its clients in its statements to shareholders.

entry.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
entry.summary: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?
entry.summary: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.

entry.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market
entry.summary: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.

entry.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough
entry.summary: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.

entry.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.

entry.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
entry.summary: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."
